trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_SEQ_00<tab>The doomsaying dwarf wishes to send you to gather machine parts─and definitely not to your doom.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_TODO_00<tab>Obtain salvage in the Copied Factory.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the salvage to the doomsaying dwarf.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_001<tab>Ready to go to your doom─er...I mean, get to work, are you? Good, good.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_002<tab>As per the chief's instructions, your task is to gather items the machines left behind that might prove useful for rebuilding our village.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_003<tab>Do you know any suitable places for this?
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_A1_000_001<tab>The machines have a base deep in the tunnels.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_A1_000_002<tab>There's a ruined factory strewn with machina.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_005<tab>Oho, that sounds perfectly forbidding!
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_006<tab>While you're out there searching, I'll get my tools ready for dismantling.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_010<tab>I look forward to seeing the spoils of your foray!
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_050<tab>How goes the search? I stand ready to dismantle the spoils of your foray!
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_100<tab>Well, drench my beard, I've never seen anything like this... It's not going to suddenly spring to life and strangle me, is it?
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_101<tab>No? Well, if you're sure... I'll set about studying it at once.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_102<tab>Oh, I should mention that the chief was looking for you. Seems he has news to share. It's something dreadful, I shouldn't doubt...
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_105<tab>Have you spoken with the chief yet? Seems he has news to share. It's something dreadful, I shouldn't doubt...
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_150<tab>Hm? Ready for another foray, are you? Well, if it wouldn't be too much of a bother...
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_151<tab>Excellent! Let our inexorable march towards failure continue!

TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_152<tab>So, do you recall the machina you brought back last time? Unfortunately, they were rather far gone, and I couldn't salvage much of them. Do you think you could bring back more of the same?
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_A2_000_001<tab>Consider it done.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_A2_000_002<tab>If you think it best.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_154<tab>Thank you! With the bits from the extra specimens, I think we can put together something useful─even if we're inevitably doomed to fail.

TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_155<tab>Please bring me more of the same machina as last time. With the bits from the extra specimens, I think we can put together something useful─even if we're inevitably doomed to fail.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_250<tab>Ah, yes, precisely the same as last time! This ought to suffice for our purposes, thank you!

TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_251<tab>You know, I've been feeling a little bit more optimistic in spite of myself. By keeping occupied with our work, I find my mind doesn't stray towards the doom and gloom as often as it used to. Seems it's better to take action than being idle with negative thoughts.
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_252<tab>If only it weren't so hard to take action in the first place...

TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_253<tab>Well, I should be getting back to my work. Perhaps you could report to the chief, in case he has other tasks that want doing. Thanks again for bringing the parts!
TEXT_LUCKTA521_04050_VILLAGERD03954_000_255<tab>To be deleted.
